A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a Star Wars fan since I can remember and The Last Jedi is one of the best\, if not the best\, Star Wars movie of all time. The filmmakers took some bold risks that made this the most interesting action film that's come out in years. This film and TFA have given us the most complex and brilliantly acted antagonist in the Star Wars universe. Adam Driver is one of the greatest actors of our generation.
